item.title: Report I-2024030052
item.description:
Report I-2024030052

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-27T15:12:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-15
  • City: GILLETTE
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PLAINS MARKETING GP INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 1
  • Description: Plains unit was heading southbound on Highway 50 when another commercial vehicle (CMV) driving in the· northbound lane lost traction and jackknifed in front of the Plains unit, resulting in a collision. After impact, the Plains· cab and cargo tank entered into a ditch and suffered a roll-over, while the pup trailer remained on the road. As a result of the roll-over of the cargo tank, the manway cover was damaged resulting in an unintentional release of 3-gallons, which was contained on the crows nest. No material from the Plains unit made contact with the ground. A supplemental report will be submitted pending further investigation to the costs associated with the incident.
